  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String username)
      This method adds player in the player list until the Lobby is full.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player to add.

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard()
      This method fills the Board with items.

    • DrawCommonGoalCards

      public void DrawCommonGoalCards()
      This method draws the Common Goal Cards and initialize its token values.

    • DrawPersonalGoalCards

      public void DrawPersonalGoalCards()
      This method draws the Personal Goal Card for each player and sets its logic.

    • ChooseFirstPlayerSeat

      public void ChooseFirstPlayerSeat()
      This method chooses the First Player Seat from the player List in MASTER. The First Player seat is the player to start the fist turn.

    • masterStartTurn

      public void masterStartTurn()
      This method stats the turn of the player , if it's not the last, then round and turn are updated and the player's bookshelf is checked. If it's the last turn the score of each player is calculated checking personal goals and adjacent item_tiles on the bookshelves, then the scores are compared and the winner's name is saved in Space.winner . The score from the common goals cannot be checked here. below there is the reason. ( this method is implemented only by the server and only in the first turn, it has been replaced by the method masterEndTurn( String username ) and forcedEndTurn( String username ) )

    • playerDrawItem

      public boolean playerDrawItem(String username, int n, int m)
      The player has to ask the MODEL if he can pick an item_tile. One item_tile at a time. Once he is satisfied with the pick, the picked items are stored in his bookshelf class until he wants to put them in the bookshelf grid.
      Parameters:
      n - it's the row from witch to pick the item
      m - it's the column from witch to pick the item
      Returns:
      true only if the pick is valid

    • playerPutItems

      public boolean playerPutItems(String username, int m, int a, int b, int c)
      The player chooses the order to put the items in the bookshelf by giving each item_tile a number that goes from 0 to 2. for example: if a = 2 then the first item picked is the last to be put in the bookshelf in the m column. If you fill the bookshelf you update the game to it's last round, NOT necessarily the last turn.
      Parameters:
      m - it's the column to put the items
      a - it's the order of the first item to put in the bookshelf
      b - it's the order of the second item to put in the bookshelf
      c - it's the order of the third item to put in the bookshelf

    • CheckScore

      public void CheckScore(String username)
      This only checks the score of the PlayerToPlay. If the player has reached a Common Goals his score is updated. Each Common Goal can be achieved only once.
      Parameters:
      username - is the PlayerToPlay

    • masterEndTurn

      public boolean masterEndTurn(String username)
      This method ends the turn of a player and sets the next turn. If the board is empty or there are no drawable items, the board is refilled. If the Bookshelf of the player that is ending his turn is full, the last round starts and 1 score point is given. The score of the player is checked only for the Common Goals. ( Personal Goals and Adjacent Items are checked in the last turn ) The new PlayerToPlay is chosen.
      Parameters:
      username - it's the playerToPlay
      Returns:
      true if the correct player has ended the turn.

    • forcedEndTurn

      public void forcedEndTurn(String username)
      This method allow the server to force the end of the playerToPlay's turn by resetting his draw ( if he didn't put the drawn items in his bookshelf ).
      Parameters:
      username - it's the playerToPlay

    • getScore

      public int getScore(String username)
      This method return the score of the player with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player
      Returns:
      the score of the player.

    • search

      public int search(String username)
      This method searches the index of the player with the given username from the player list in SPACE.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player to search
      Returns:
      the index of the player in the player list in SPACE
